title: Prajwal Revanna Case: Rahul Gandhi Accuses Modi of Protecting Criminals, Demands Justice for Victims
content:
Rahul Gandhi has accused Prime Minister Narendra Modi of supporting criminals and shielding them from justice. He specifically pointed to the case of Prajwal Revanna, a Hassan MP, who is facing allegations of sexual abuse. 

Gandhi claims that the BJP government has allowed Revanna to escape India, hindering a proper investigation. He also alleges that Home Minister Amit Shah was informed about Revanna's past actions, but no action was taken. 

Gandhi's letter to Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah demands justice for the victims and calls for a thorough investigation to bring all perpetrators to account.
author: Scroll Staff
